text:
I strongly believe in OpenCourseWare’s mission
to make education available globally to everyone

I feel like I can pinpoint to many points
in my life, different people that I met that

Or different resources that helped me along
the way.
OpenCourseWare is certainly one of those things.

I mean it’s hard to say where I would be
without it.

It was definitely a crucial ingredient that
I needed in order to find myself here.

My story is just one tiny story among the
millions of people that have been able to

Being a beneficiary of such resources, and
free of charge, it compels me to do my part
to give back what I have freely received.

And I’m sure there are a lot of other people
that feel the same way.
